text: Kerry Vincent ( Flynn; 1 June 1945 â€“ 2 January 2021) was an Australian television personality and baker. She lived and worked in the United States. She was a judge on many Food Network shows. She was also the co-founder of the annual Oklahoma State Sugar Art Show. In 2013, she was a judge in The Great Australian Bake Off. Vincent was born in Wyalkatchem, Western Australia. Vincent died of an illness on 2 January 2021 in Tulsa, Oklahoma. She was 75. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1945 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Australian television presenters Category:Chefs Category:Disease- related deaths in Oklahoma
title: Kerry Vincent
